languages.text: [Коварно улыбнуться] "Источник бед отсека в голоде и нищете, что толкают людей на преступления. Я уверен{mf||а}, ты бы давно что-то предпринял, но тебе мешают... некоторые правила".

traits.locale_text: "Источник бед отсека в голоде и нищете, что толкают людей на преступления. Я уверен{mf||а}, ты бы давно что-то предпринял, но тебе мешают... некоторые правила".

languages.text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"
languages.original_text: [Коварно улыбнуться] "Источник бед отсека в голоде и нищете, что толкают людей на преступления. Я уверен{mf||а}, ты бы давно что-то предпринял, но тебе мешают... некоторые правила".

traits.locale_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes is hunger and poverty that drive those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting, isn't that right?"
[Put on a fake frown] "Those people live in appalling conditions. Can you really not think of any way to help them? Are you not who I entrusted with them?"

[Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

languages.text: [Vieldeutig lächeln] "Der Ursprung der Probleme dieses Moduls sind Hunger und Armut, was diese Leute wiederum in die Kriminalität treibt. Ich bin sicher, Ihr hättet längst etwas unternommen, wenn Ihr nicht gewissen Regeln unterworfen wärt, die Euch zu stark ... einschränken. Ist es nicht so?"
languages.original_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: [Vieldeutig lächeln] "Der Ursprung der Probleme dieses Moduls sind Hunger und Armut, was diese Leute wiederum in die Kriminalität treibt. Ich bin sicher, Ihr hättet längst etwas unternommen, wenn Ihr nicht gewissen Regeln unterworfen wärt, die Euch zu stark ... einschränken. Ist es nicht so?"
[Sorge heucheln] "Diese Leute leben in fürchterlichen Verhältnissen. Fällt Euch wirklich nichts ein, wie Ihr ihnen helfen könnt? Seid Ihr nicht der Offizier, dem ich ihr Schicksal anvertraut habe?"

languages.text: [Lui adresser un sourire plein de sous-entendus] « Tous les malheurs de ce compartiment trouvent leur source dans la faim et la pauvreté, qui poussent ces gens à se livrer à de menus larcins. Vous auriez sans doute réagi plus tôt si certaines règles en vigueur à notre bord ne vous en avaient pas empêché... Je me trompe ? »
languages.original_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: [Lui adresser un sourire plein de sous-entendus] « Tous les malheurs de ce compartiment trouvent leur source dans la faim et la pauvreté, qui poussent ces gens à se livrer à de menus larcins. Vous auriez sans doute réagi plus tôt si certaines règles en vigueur à notre bord ne vous en avaient pas empêché... Je me trompe ? »

[Faire semblant de froncer les sourcils] « Ces gens vivent dans des conditions déplorables. Ne pouvez-vous pas trouver un moyen de les aider ? N'êtes-vous pas l'officier à qui j'ai confié leur sort ? »

languages.text: [Sonreír con complicidad] «Los motivos de todas las penurias de este compartimento son el hambre y la pobreza, que a su vez empujan a esta gente a cometer delitos menores. Tengo claro que usted ya habría hecho algo para remediarlo de no verse constreñido por una normativa excesivamente... restrictiva. ¿Me equivoco?».
languages.original_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír con complicidad] «Los motivos de todas las penurias de este compartimento son el hambre y la pobreza, que a su vez empujan a esta gente a cometer delitos menores. Tengo claro que usted ya habría hecho algo para remediarlo de no verse constreñido por una normativa excesivamente... restrictiva. ¿Me equivoco?».
[Fruncir el ceño] «Esta gente vive en condiciones deplorables. ¿De verdad no se le ocurre ningún modo de ayudarles? ¿No es usted el oficial a quien confié su cuidado?».

languages.text: [意味ありげに微笑む]「この区画のすべての苦難の元凶は、飢えと貧困であり、その結果、人々は些細な犯罪を犯すようになっている。お前たちだって今頃は何とかしているはずだろうが、従わなければならない決まりがあり、それゆえにひどく…制限されている。そうなのだろう？」
languages.original_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: [意味ありげに微笑む]「この区画のすべての苦難の元凶は、飢えと貧困であり、その結果、人々は些細な犯罪を犯すようになっている。お前たちだって今頃は何とかしているはずだろうが、従わなければならない決まりがあり、それゆえにひどく…制限されている。そうなのだろう？」
[しかめっ面を作る]「あの者たちは酷い環境で暮らしている。彼らを救える方法を、本当に思いつかないのか？お前は、私が彼らの運命を一任した士官なのではないのか？」

languages.text: [面带讥讽地微笑]“这片甲板的所有问题，都源于饥饿和贫穷，而饥饿和贫困反过来又会促使那些人犯下轻微的罪行。我相信你已经采取了一些措施，但你却不得不遵守某些规定。这些规定……会限制你的发挥，我没说错吧？”
languages.original_text: [Smile insinuatingly] "The source of all of this compartment's woes are hunger and poverty, which in turn are driving those people to commit petty crimes. I am sure you would have done something by now, but there are certain rules you have to follow that are simply too... limiting. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: [面带讥讽地微笑]“这片甲板的所有问题，都源于饥饿和贫穷，而饥饿和贫困反过来又会促使那些人犯下轻微的罪行。我相信你已经采取了一些措施，但你却不得不遵守某些规定。这些规定……会限制你的发挥，我没说错吧？”
[故作不满地皱起眉头]“那些人的生活条件相当恶劣，你真的想不出任何方法来帮助他们吗？我明明把他们的命运托付到了你这位军官的手里，难道不是吗？”
